DataSource.Name: Filters
Item
DataSource.SQL:
declare @DateFrom date; set @DateFrom=:@DateFrom; declare @DateTo date; set @DateTo=:@DateTo; declare @LocationId uniqueidentifier; set @LocationId=:@LocationId; declare @OpAreaId uniqueidentifier; set @OpAreaId=:@OpAreaId; declare @WorkstationId uniqueidentifier; set @WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId; declare @UserId uniqueidentifier; set @UserId=:@UserId; declare @PaymentMethodId uniqueidentifier; set @PaymentMethodId=:@Z_PaymentMethodId; declare @TagId uniqueidentifier; set @TagId=:@Z_TagId;
select 1 as GroupDummy, Coalesce(PG.TagName, '-') as PrintGroup, P.ProductCode, P.ProductName, (case when P.ProductType=2/*system*/ then null else SI.StatAmount end) as UnitAmount, SI.UnitTax, Sum(TI.QtyPaid) as ActivityQty, Sum(TI.QtyPaid * SI.UnitTax) as ActivityTax, Sum(TI.QtyPaid * SI.StatAmount) as ActivityAmount, Sum(case when T.TransactionType in (14/*SaleVoid*/, 22/*TicketVoid*/, 46/*NegTrn*/, 47/*TicketCancellation*/, 48/*SaleCancellation*/) then -TI.QtyPaid else 0 end) as VoidQty from tbTransaction T inner join tbTransactionItem TI on TI.TransactionId=T.TransactionId inner join tbSaleItem SI on SI.SaleItemId=TI.SaleItemId left join tbProduct P on P.ProductId=SI.ProductId left join tbTag PG on PG.TagId=P.PrintGroupTagId left join tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId where T.SerialFiscalDate>=@DateFrom and T.SerialFiscalDate<=@DateTo and TI.QtyPaid<>0 and (@WorkstationId is null or T.WorkstationId=@WorkstationId) and (@OpAreaId is null or OPA.AccountId=@OpAreaId) and (@LocationId is null or OPA.ParentAccountId=@LocationId) and (@UserId is null or T.UserAccountId=@UserId) and ( @PaymentMethodId is null or exists ( select * from tbPayment XP where XP.TransactionId=T.TransactionId and XP.PluginId=@PaymentMethodId and XP.PaymentStatus=2/*approved*/ ) ) and (@TagId is null or SI.ProductId in (select EntityId from tbTagLink where TagId=@TagId)) group by PG.TagName, P.ProductCode, P.ProductName, (case when P.ProductType=2/*system*/ then null else SI.StatAmount end), SI.UnitTax order by PG.TagName, P.ProductName

DataSource.Name: Payment
Recap
DataSource.SQL:
declare @DateFrom date; set @DateFrom=:@DateFrom; declare @DateTo date; set @DateTo=:@DateTo; declare @LocationId uniqueidentifier; set @LocationId=:@LocationId; declare @OpAreaId uniqueidentifier; set @OpAreaId=:@OpAreaId; declare @WorkstationId uniqueidentifier; set @WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId; declare @UserId uniqueidentifier; set @UserId=:@UserId; declare @PaymentMethodId uniqueidentifier; set @PaymentMethodId=:@Z_PaymentMethodId; declare @TagId uniqueidentifier; set @TagId=:@Z_TagId;
select Coalesce(Sum(T.TotalAmount), 0) as ActivityAmount, Coalesce(Sum(T.ItemCount), 0) as ActivityQty, Coalesce(Sum(case when T.TransactionType=22 /* TicketVoid */ then -T.ItemCount else 0 end), 0) as VoidQty, Coalesce(Sum(case when T.TransactionType=22 /* TicketVoid */ then -T.PaidAmount else 0 end), 0) as VoidAmount, Coalesce(Sum(T.PaidAmount), 0) as PaidAmount, Coalesce(Sum(T.PaidTax), 0) as PaidTax, Coalesce(Sum(T.PrintedCount), 0) as PrintedQty from tbTransaction T left join tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId where T.SerialFiscalDate>=@DateFrom and T.SerialFiscalDate<=@DateTo and (@WorkstationId is null or T.WorkstationId=@WorkstationId) and (@OpAreaId is null or OPA.AccountId=@OpAreaId) and (@LocationId is null or OPA.ParentAccountId=@LocationId) and (@UserId is null or T.UserAccountId=@UserId) and ( @PaymentMethodId is null or exists ( select * from tbPayment XP where XP.TransactionId=T.TransactionId and XP.PluginId=@PaymentMethodId and XP.PaymentStatus=2/*approved*/ ) )and ( exists ( select * from tbTransactionItem XTI inner join tbSaleItem XSI on XSI.SaleItemId=XTI.SaleItemId inner join tbTagLink XTGL on XTGL.EntityId=XSI.ProductId and XTGL.TagId=@TagId where XTI.TransactionId=T.TransactionId ) )
